Aug. 17, 1895 D Scunthorpe Contest (Section 2)
Scunthorpe Contest (Section 2) 20 Test Piece Contest Scunthorpe Contest scunthorpe-contest-section-2
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Brumby Hall Park, Scunthorpe Open to bands which had not won a prize of £10 or over Prizes: £17, £4, £2. 6 bands competed
April 18, 2012, 5:35 p.m. Dec. 10, 2019, 2:01 p.m.
1 Mexborough Great Central John Dawson
2 Parkgate Temperance Charles T. Hurst
3 K Company 1st Volunteer Battalion Lincolnshire Regiment (Frodingham) Band G. Durney
4 East Hull Samuel Schofield
Unknown Result Grimsby Borough Band George White
Unknown Result Barton Excelsior R. Dewey
